results.title: ARD Design
results.overview: At first, ARD Design already had a website that embodies their creative taste, with interactivity, animation, and smooth transition. The problem was, to achieve all those elements, the previous website used Flash. The problem with Flash in this case that it requires loading until every content are loaded. Since ARD have a lot of projects inside their website, waiting became very long. And to be relevant at this time and age, they want it to be fast.

article.content: At first, ARD Design already had a website that embodies their creative taste, with interactivity, animation, and smooth transition. The problem was, to achieve all those elements, the previous website used Flash.

The problem with Flash in this case that it requires loading until every content are loaded. Since ARD have a lot of projects inside their website, waiting became very long. And to be relevant at this time and age, they want it to be fast.
In short, they want to show their creative side and be fast.
To answer their need of a website that reflects their identity and with faster loading, I proposed to approach things from something simple. Their unique color palette from their logo.

article.label: The brown color was a bit different to draw more contrast from the logo

results.title: Bimata's Storywork
results.overview: I used to publish my fictions through blogspot and forums. Using them for years, I started to dislike the distractions that come from reading through them. Then it hit me: "Why not develop my own website for it?" Craving for a distraction-free environment to better hosts my fictions, I found this clean looking template and decided to start from there.

results.title: Frienemies
results.overview: Frienemies is a 2-4 player party game with mini-games to test your friendship to the limit! Play with your friends and have them hate you as you win (or mock you for losing) the game! CAUTION: this game may ruin your phone... or your friendship.
